claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a portion of the Flublok prescribing information showing the NDC numbers for the single-dose prefilled syringe presentation and storage/handling instructions. It does not include any information about approved age groups or that Flublok is indicated for adults 18 years and older. There is no reference to patient age or indication in the visible text, so it does not support the claim.
